mapper.select: select *from product_category order by depth asc;
mapper.insert: insert into product (productName, categoryCode, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, regdate, productImage, productThumbnail, sale) values (#{productName}, #{categoryCode}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, sysdate(), #{productImage}, #{productThumbnail}, #{sale})
mapper.select: select p.productNum, p.productName, c.categoryCode, c.categoryCodeRef, c.categoryName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, regdate, p.productImage, p.productThumbnail, p.sale from product p inner join product_category c on p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode order by p.productNum desc
mapper.update: update product set productName = #{productName}, categoryCode = #{categoryCode}, productPrice = #{productPrice}, productStock = #{productStock}, productDescription = #{productDescription}, productImage = #{productImage}, productThumbnail = #{productThumbnail}, sale = #{sale} where productNum = #{productNum}
